title: Runner-up at World Cup tournaments by country 1930 to 2014
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of runners-up in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of runners-up is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
The highest Country Germany has 3.0 more Number of runners-up than the lowest Country France.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of runners-up is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of runners-up is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
Country Argentina has the second highest value for Number of runners-up.
The difference of Number of runners-up between the highest and lowest Country is 3.0.
Country Germany is higher than any other Countrys with value 4.0, followed by Argentina, and Argentina. Down to Country France with the lowest value 1.0.
Country Czech Republic, Brazil, Czechoslovakia, Italy, and Hungary have the same Number of runners-up.
The highest value 4.0 at Germany is almost 1.82 times larger than the average value 2.2.
